name: Haven Network
description: Haven is a mission-driven platform that radically simplifies access to government and corporate contracts--many of which businesses are unaware of. In a landscape of outdated systems, bureaucratic jargon, and scattered portals, Haven unites over 12,000 buying agencies into one intuitive platform. Acting as a business development partner, we automatically match businesses with the right opportunities, drastically reducing the time and effort required to find and secure contracts.
one_liner: Haven is a mission-driven platform that radically simplifies access to government and corporate contracts--many of which businesses are unaware of. In a landscape of outdated systems, bureaucratic jargon, and scattered portals, Haven unites over 12,000 buying agencies into one intuitive platform. Acting as a business development partner, we automatically match businesses with the right opportunities, drastically reducing the time and effort required to find and secure contracts.
